name: Car Comprehensive
query:
select 
TS.serial_no AS "SerialNo:Link/Serial No:150",
IT.item_group AS "Item Group:Link/Item Group:100",
IT.item_name, 
MAX(IF (TVA.attribute ='Color',TVA.attribute_value,'')) AS Color,
MAX(IF (TVA.attribute ='model',TVA.attribute_value,'')) AS Model,
MAX(IF (TVA.attribute ='Category',TVA.attribute_value,'')) AS Category,
TS.reservation_status,
TS.warehouse as "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:100",
NCR.name as "CarRequest:Link/New Car Request:100",
NCR.request_date as RequestDate,
PO.name as "PO:Link/Purchase Order:100",
PO.transaction_date as PODate,
PIT.rate as PurchaseRate,
PIT.discount_amount as Discount,
PIT.base_net_rate as NetAmount,
PIR.name as "PurchaseReturn:Link/Purchase Return:120",
PR.name as "PurchaseReceipt:Link/Purchase Receipt:120",
PR.posting_date as ReceiveDate,
PI.name as "PurchaseInvoice:Link/Purchase Invoice:120",
PI.posting_date as PurchaseDate,
TS.supplier as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:130",
PI.tax_id as Tax,
SUM(ST.transfer_cost) as TransferCost,
WC.rate,
TS.plate_cost as PlateCost,
SUM(EED.amount) as CarMaintenanceCost,
SUM(EEDOC.amount) as OutsideCommission,
SP.commission_per_car as InternalCommission,
SO.name as "SO:Link/Sales Order:120",
SO.transaction_date as SODate,
SOI.amount as SalesAmount,
SOI.discount_amount AS Discount,
SOI.base_net_amount AS NetAmount,
SO.customer As "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
SO.customer_name,
C.customer_name as SubCustomer,
SI.name as "SalesInvoice:Link/Sales Invoice:120",
SI.posting_date as InvoiceDate,
DN.name as "DeliveryNote:Link/Delivery Note:120",
DN.posting_date as DeliveryDate,
SI.sales_person as "SalesMan:Link/Sales Person:130"
from `tabSerial No` AS TS
INNER JOIN tabItem as IT  
ON TS.item_code = IT.item_code
INNER JOIN `tabItem Variant Attribute` as TVA 
ON TS.item_code = TVA.parent
LEFT JOIN `tabNew Car Request Item` AS NCRI 
ON TS.serial_no = NCRI.serial_no 
LEFT JOIN `tabNew Car Request` AS NCR
ON NCR.name =NCRI.parent
and NCR.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Receipt` AS PR
ON PR.name  = TS.purchase_document_no
and PR.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Receipt Item` AS PRI
ON PR.name = PRI.parent
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice Item` AS PIT 
ON PR.name = PIT.purchase_receipt
and TS.item_code = PIT.item_code
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice` AS PI
ON PI.name = PIT.parent
and PI.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Order` AS PO 
ON  PRI.purchase_order = PO.name 
and PO.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Order Item` AS POI 
ON PO.name = POI.parent
and FIND_IN_SET(TS.serial_no, REPLACE(PIT.serial_no, '\n', ',' )) > 0
LEFT JOIN  `tabSales Person` as SP 
ON TS.sales_person = SP.name
LEFT JOIN  `tabSales Order` as SO
ON TS.reserved_by_document = SO.name
AND  SO.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN tabCustomer as C 
on C.name = SO.sub_customer
LEFT JOIN `tabSales Order Item` as SOI 
ON SOI.parent = SO.name
and FIND_IN_SET(TS.serial_no, REPLACE(SOI.serial_no, '\n', ',' )) > 0
left JOIN  `tabSales Invoice` AS SI 
ON TS.sales_invoice = SI.name
and SI.docstatus = 1
left JOIN  `tabDelivery Note` AS DN 
ON TS.delivery_document_no = DN.name
AND DN.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice Item`  as PIRI
on FIND_IN_SET(TS.serial_no, REPLACE(PIRI.serial_no, '\n', ',' )) > 0
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice` as PIR
ON PIR.name = PIRI.parent
and PIR.is_return = 1
and PIR.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item`  as SRI
on FIND_IN_SET(TS.serial_no, REPLACE(SRI.serial_no, '\n', ',' )) > 0
LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice` as SR
ON SR.name = SRI.parent
and SR.is_return = 1
and SR.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN `tabStock Entry Detail` AS STD 
on FIND_IN_SET(TS.serial_no, REPLACE(STD.serial_no, '\n', ',' )) > 0
left JOIN `tabStock Entry` as ST
ON ST.name = STD.parent
and TS.item_code = PIT.item_code
and FIND_IN_SET(TS.serial_no, REPLACE(PIT.serial_no, '\n', ',' )) > 0
LEFT JOIN `tabWarranty Card Issued` as  WC 
ON TS.serial_no = WC.serial_no 
LEFT JOIN `tabExpenses Entry Detail` EED 
ON TS.serial_no = EED.serial_no 
LEFT JOIN `tabCompany` as TCM 
ON TCM.default_car_maintenance_account_cf =  EED.expense_account 
LEFT JOIN `tabExpenses Entry Detail` EEDOC 
ON TS.serial_no = EEDOC.serial_no 
LEFT JOIN `tabCompany` as TCOC 
ON TCOC.default_outside_commission_account_cf =  EEDOC.expense_account 
-- WHERE (PI.posting_date between from_date and to_date) OR ( SI.posting_date between from_date and to_date)
GROUP BY 
TS.serial_no,
IT.item_group,
IT.item_name,
TS.reservation_status,
TS.warehouse,
NCR.name,
NCR.request_date,
PO.name ,
PO.transaction_date ,
PIT.amount ,
PIT.discount_amount ,
PIT.base_net_amount ,
PIR.name ,
PR.name ,
PR.posting_date,
PI.name ,
PI.posting_date ,
TS.supplier ,
PI.tax_id ,
WC.rate,
TS.plate_cost,
SP.commission_per_car ,
SO.name ,
SO.transaction_date ,
SOI.amount ,
SOI.discount_amount ,
SOI.base_net_amount ,
SO.customer,
SO.customer_name,
C.customer_name ,
SI.name ,
SI.posting_date ,
DN.name ,
DN.posting_date ,
SI.sales_person
